### Iconicity Patterns in Sign Languages

Download database: [.csv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Pandaklez/Iconicity-in-Sign-Languages/master/annotated_data_new.csv)

#### Window
```{r}
library(lingtypology)
library(htmlwidgets)
df <- read.csv("window.csv")
df$urls <- sapply(df$urls, function(x){paste(c("<video width='250' height='200' controls> <source src='", as.character(x), "' type='video/mp4'></video>"), sep = "", collapse = "")})
set.seed(4) # for having the same colors
m <- map.feature(languages = df$languages,
                 features = df$pattern,
                 stroke.features = df$base,
                 popup = df$urls,
                 title = df$word[1],
                 width = 500)
#path <- paste0(df$word[1], ".html")
#saveWidget(m, file=path)
```
